field.name: summary
field.value: Build of TransactionComponentInspector.cs failing after IOC-ISSUE-173 patch

field.name: description
field.value:
The applied patch to Castle.MicroKernel\ModelBuilder\Inspectors\MethodMetaInspector.cs for IOC-ISSUE-173 has caused Castle.Facilities.AutomaticTransactionManagement\TransactionComponentInspector.cs to fail with error CS0115:
'Castle.Facilities.AutomaticTransactionManagement.TransactionComponentInspector.ProcessMeta(Castle.Core.ComponentModel, System.Reflection.MethodInfo[], Castle.Core.MethodMetaModel)': no suitable method found to override
The second parameter should now be an IList<MethodInfo>

comment.author: ericbock
comment.text: I attached a patch that updates the TransactionComponentInspector.ProcessMeta signature to match that of MethodMetaInspector. However, I didn't trace to see if there are any subclasses of TransactionComponentInspector that need to be updated as well. I also didn't touch metaStore (of type TransactionMetaInfoStore) that gets called in the ProcessMeta method, instead just converting the IList<MethodInfo> back to the MethodInfo[] it expects.
